amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a disability preference program for qualified tax collection contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2625 proposed by Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S13120-13121, S13130; text: CR S13120-13121) To require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a disability preference program for qualified tax collection contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2625 proposed by Senator Nelson NE.
